properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , NICKNAME , DOB , GENDER , EMAIL , POST_NO , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_D , PHONE , ENROLL_DATE , ADOPT_YN , ENTER_YN , PAY_YN , DELETE_YN , DEL_REASON , DEL_DATE , BLACKLIST_YN , BLACK_REASON , BLACK_DATE , GRADE FROM MEM_INFO WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND DELETE_YN = 'N'

INSERT INTO MEM_INFO ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , NICKNAME , DOB , GENDER , EMAIL , POST_NO , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_D , PHONE , ENROLL_DATE , ADOPT_YN , ENTER_YN , PAY_YN , DELETE_YN , DEL_REASON , DEL_DATE , BLACKLIST_YN , BLACK_REASON , BLACK_DATE , GRADE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM MEM_INFO WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N'
